items.title: 日 (rì)
items.content:
Meaning: sun, day

Pinyin: rì

Stroke count: 4

This character represents the sun or a day. It resembles an ancient pictograph of the sun.

items.title: 月 (yuè)
items.content:
Meaning: moon, month

Pinyin: yuè

Stroke count: 4

This character means moon or month. It derives from an ancient pictograph showing the crescent moon.
